ml_projects.name: Real-Time Object Detection
ml_projects.description: I developed a program that can detect 80 different objects in realtime using SSD MobileNet V2 FPNLite model.

ml_projects.name: Image Classification using Deep Learning
ml_projects.description: Developed a deep learning-based clothes classification model using PyTorch and VGG16, with image preprocessing, model training and validation, and accuracy assessment.

ml_projects.name: Machine Learning-Driven-CLV-Prediction
ml_projects.description: I did exploratory data analysis using python and built a predictive model that can accurately forecast the Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) for an e-commerce business.

ml_projects.name: Spotify Stock Analysis
ml_projects.description: I analyzed Spotify's current stock trends using Python tools. I also made predictions using Linear Regression.

ml_projects.name: NLP IMDb Sentiment Analysis
ml_projects.description: Analyzes sentiments of movie reviews from IMDb using NLP techniques to classify reviews as positive or negative.

ml_projects.name: Iris Flower Species Predictor
ml_projects.description: A Streamlit app that predicts the species of Iris flowers with high accuracy, utilizing machine learning models.

chatgpt_api_projects.name: Terms and Conditions Summarizer
chatgpt_api_projects.description: This web application provides a concise, understandable summary of key points in Terms of Service documents, helping users understand their rights and obligations before agreeing to them. Utilizes advanced AI techniques to parse and summarize complex legal documents.

chatgpt_api_projects.name: Smart Nutrition Assistant
chatgpt_api_projects.description: Private project focused on providing nutritional advice using chatGPT'S API, offering personalized meal planning and tracking.

misc_projects.name: Astro Mania
misc_projects.description: A challenging arcade game developed in Python, where players navigate a spaceship through various levels.

misc_projects.name: Tetris Rush
misc_projects.description: A fast-paced version of the classic Tetris game, built with Python to offer an engaging puzzle-solving experience.

misc_projects.name: Bit Manipulation
misc_projects.description: Educational project that demonstrates various bit manipulation techniques using C programming.

misc_projects.name: Blackjack
misc_projects.description: A web-based version of the Blackjack card game, designed to provide a fun and interactive gaming experience.

misc_projects.name: Crazy 8 Game
misc_projects.description: Digital version of the popular Crazy 8 card game, developed to offer both single and multiplayer modes.

misc_projects.name: Connect 4
misc_projects.description: A Python implementation of the classic board game Connect 4. This project allows two players to compete directly, demonstrating Python's utility in developing interactive applications.

misc_projects.name: Flight-Ticket Management System
misc_projects.description: A system for managing flight tickets using C++. It efficiently handles bookings and schedules, showcasing advanced C++ programming and data structure utilization.

misc_projects.name: Contact Management System
misc_projects.description: A C++ based application designed to manage personal and professional contacts. It incorporates basic file handling and data management principles to organize contact information efficiently.

misc_projects.name: Task Manager
misc_projects.description: A JavaScript-based web application for managing tasks. It allows users to add, delete, and organize tasks with an interactive and user-friendly interface.

misc_projects.name: Budget Tracker Web App
misc_projects.description: This web app helps users track their expenses and manage their budget. Built using JavaScript, it provides insights into spending patterns with graphical data visualization.

misc_projects.name: Anonymous Course Review Site
misc_projects.description: A platform for students to anonymously submit and review feedback on courses and instructors. It fosters a culture of transparency and helps improve educational standards.
